caption.title: R 0 cannot predict epidemic size exactly.
caption.p: The dependence of FI ∞ on R 0 and β is shown for: (a) all epidemic pairs involving strains isolated in 2009; (b) epidemic pairs involving strains isolated in 2009, and with R 0 < 7. Only epidemic pairs with m > 1 are plotted. The red line shows the epidemic size in the case of homogeneous susceptibilities. We see that when R 0 > 1, FI ∞ takes on a wide range of values for any given R 0.
